nodes.text: Jaccun Pereez was a male Imperial moff. His daughter, Famma, was engaged to the young Imperial Commander Yendiv Bensek.

Pereez was known to drink alcohol and gamble heavily, and had accrued large debts from doing so by the time of his daughter’s wedding. According to Iden Versio’s research, Pereez was a well-liked ruler by the people of Arvaka Prime. Furthermore, Pereez had a weak heart.
